meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adrianne Woodward Gerard Simonette Rachel Lindgren Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7681.

td.p: Adrianne Woodward, an office assistant from Rancho Cucamonga, California
Gerard Simonette, a retired mental health professional from Northampton, Massachusetts
Rachel Lindgren, a fire lookout from Bend, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: MYOPIC BIOPICS
COUNTRY NICKNAMES
YOU GOTTA STAND FOR SOMETHING
A GOOD BOOK
CAMPBELLS
SOUP
